summary: I promise NEVER to share Episode IX spoilers. Real or fake. Tbh, I'm going to disappear altogether if spoilers start...
body:
I promise NEVER to share Episode IX spoilers.

Real or fake.

Tbh, I’m going to disappear altogether if spoilers start circulating. I’m not okay with that. At all.

summary: trust the force, trust in us
title: trust the force, trust in us
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2IXoPLH

by melanoradrood

Jyn Erso reimagined - She’s still with the Partisans when Bodhi and his message arrives on Jedha, and he has surprising news… that her mother is still alive and held on Eadu.

Written for Jyn Erso Appreciation Week on Tumblr.

title: Just Say the word
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2s65ptl

by ElementalDragon

(Satine x OC)

Prompt: Ziva Vicari is a Jedi that was sent to protect Duchess Satine Kryze, from only the assassination attempts on her life, but the threat of the dark side looming over the galaxy.

Over the three months that the two women are together, there seems to be something more than what they started with.

blog.name: silver-glass
blog.title: look up, child.
blog.description:
prev. agent-sousas

Hannah // 21 // Amateur Artist

Look at you, you've found a safe place!

The name may have changed, but you can still call me Sous.

Follower of Jesus who also happens to be a complete, unapologetic dork.

Wanna scream into my inbox about life or your fabulous fandom??

Go for it. I got time.

summary:
I wonder if Jango ever just . . . 
. . . lost Boba. 
Like did Jango ever take Boba somewhere with him, set the little guy down...
body:
I wonder if Jango ever just …

… lost Boba.

Like did Jango ever take Boba somewhere with him, set the little guy down off his shoulders, get distracted like all parents get sometimes, and suddenly turn around and kriff he’s gone.

I know that Boba had one of the most unconventional and dangerous upbringings imaginable but I refuse to believe there were no normal father-son moments or just normal parenting hijinks in general with these two or with my lady Zam Wesell.

You can’t mean to tell me that Jango “Secretly a Big Softy But Don’t Tell Anyone Or He’ll Murder You” Fett NEVER ONCE looked into his baby boy’s big brown eyes and sighed and had a lapse in judgement and muttered “How much trouble could he get into, he’s not even two” as Zam stops dead while cleaning her blaster and screams internally in the background.

LOOK IN MY OPINION JANGO WAS THE BEST BOUNTY HUNTER THE FRANCHISE HAD TO OFFER UNTIL BOBA MADE A NAME FOR HIMSELF BUT THERE IS NO WAY JANGO KNEW ANYTHING ABOUT CARING FOR BABIES OR PROPERLY RAISING A KID.

I’M JUST DYING IMAGINING THIS SCENARIO:

Jango has just made a kill somewhere and Zam took Boba off with her (“what Fett, you think I can’t hold him and shoot somebody at the same time, gimme a break”) when all of a sudden his helmet link goes off and Zam comes on the feed and the first thing she does is whisper, “He’s gone.”

This doesn’t register at first so Jango just blinks and goes “What do you mean ‘gone’ ?”

“I mean I set Boba down in the co-pilot chair while I went to check the landing gear and now he’s not there.”

Jango has never panicked and tells himself this is not a good time to start so he very calmly responds, “He’s on the Slave, Zam, just—”

“I’ve just gone over the whole ship and I’m telling you, he’s not here.”

“Zam, he’s gotta be s—”

“KRIFF FETT THE HATCH IS OPEN.”

Now Jango is imagining Zam’s death in the very near future if she truly lost his kid, fires up his jetpack. “ZAM, HOW COULD YOU LOSE MY SON?”

“FETT YOU DON’T UNDERSTAND I BUCKLED HIM IN THE SEAT THERE’S NO WAY HE COULD’VE GOTTEN DOWN.”

“WELL APPARENTLY HE DID.”

“HOW IS THAT POSSIBLE HE’S NOT EVEN TALL ENOUGH TO REACH ANY OF THE CONTROL PANELS.”

and so many hilarious hijinks follow….

summary: SOLO: A STAR WARS STORY Exclusive Interview with Joonas Suotamo (Chewbacca) #HanSoloEvent
title: SOLO: A STAR WARS STORY Exclusive Interview with Joonas Suotamo (Chewbacca) #HanSoloEvent
body:
SOLO: A STAR WARS STORY Exclusive Interview with Joonas Suotamo (Chewbacca) #HanSoloEvent

With a 6’4″ husband and a son who is already 6’5″, I’ve certainly spent my time feeling a bit on the short side, but standing next to Joonas Suotamo, who stands a a full 7-feet, I got a sense of how the Ewoks must have felt when Chewbacca stepped on the scene!  His performance as Chewbacca in SOLO: A STAR WARS story was excellent, as expected, but he also gave us wonderful new Wookie quirks to…

View On WordPress

blog.name: silentwaters4
blog.title: Imagine That
blog.description: REQUESTS: CLOSED UNTIL FUTHER NOTICE

summary: For @michaelathewordsmith…this is based on several songs including ‘Delicate’, ‘End Game’, ‘Look what you made me do’,...
caption:
For @michaelathewordsmith…this is based on several songs including ‘Delicate’, ‘End Game’, ‘Look what you made me do’, and ‘Dancing with our hands tied’, all by Taylor Swift. Enjoy!

Armitage Hux, the stoic general of the First Order, was trying his best to keep his composure. The blaster in his hand felt heavy with betrayal, love, loathing, desperation, and shame. His hand was yet to be placed on the trigger, yet his hand was raised.

Despite all that occurred, he still didn’t want this. All the treason and folly and embarrassment that happened, he was struggling to follow commands. No, not commands. Just this command.

He should have every right to want this, shouldn’t he? After how broken and shamed he felt, it was only natural. But…her eyes, there was something in her eyes and yet nothing all the same. It held all the memories, but none at the same time.

This ain’t for the best
My reputation’s never been worse, so
You must like me for me
Yeah, I want you
We can’t make
Any promises now, can we, babe? (Delicate)

She had simply been in maintenance. He recognized her from his home…it had been so long since he had been home. She was everything he had loved about the place. The fresh air, the sound of thunder, the flashes of lightning, and the rain. All of that was in her eyes. She had easily gotten his attention.

She had been a tad nervous when she was called to his office. With the doors closed, Armitage couldn’t help but to beam. Even more uncharacteristically, he hugged her. She giggled before hugging him back. The two had been nearly inseparable back on Arkanis.

“It’s been so long,” he murmured when the two pulled away.
She lowered her head a bit. “Ever since you had started going on those trips, Arkanis wasn’t the same.”
He smiled upon hearing the sentiment. “Home was never where you weren’t.”

She blushed. Armitage had grown red as he flustered about. They were so close together. As if she could read his mind, she kissed him in the secrecy of his office.

Big reputation, big reputation
Ooh you and me we got big reputations, ah
And you heard about me, ooh
I got some big enemies (End Game)

A story as old as Time, the romance picked up like a whirlwind. The pair was sucked down into a black hole of passion and flames. For the purposes of safety, the two of them kept the relationship a secret. Initially, she didn’t want to, but after hearing how terrified he was of Snoke, she relented.

So, to make things easier to explain, she was promoted to be the General’s personal assistant. She performed the job well, helping him with logistics and finding any errors in the system. In fact, no one questioned her promotion because of how much she was excelling. Armitage felt a growing sense of pride for the woman he loved.

It was strange. He knew he loved her, but it wasn’t terrifying like he thought. In fact, it was nice. Her eyes would sparkle when they were together. Privacy was their haven. The fact that no one knew pushed away the fear. It seemed that Kylo Ren didn’t even know, or he didn’t care. Regardless, it made sense that they were together. Her words could take his pain away. He could go to her with everything. She was a great listener. Maybe too good of a listener…

I don’t like your little games
Don’t like your tilted stage
The role you made me play
Of the fool, no, I don’t like you
I don’t like your perfect crime
How you laugh when you lie
You said the gun was mine
Isn’t cool, no, I don’t like you (Look What You Made me do)

It was too good to be true. She had been using their relationship for intel. Not only was she stealing information, she was giving it to the Resistance. All those late nights together, she had been working. Working the job and working him. He fell right into it. Had Snoke not questioned her himself, Hux would’ve given the entire Order to the Resistance.

What was a perfect oasis had now become a shattered fool’s dream. No, it was worse. Not even a fool would’ve taken that dream. And the worst part was that she hadn’t said a word since she was found out. Nothing to defend herself or admit what she had done. Just silence. That glimmer in her eye that he had so often seen had dulled. Her expression had become solemn.

She was preparing for death…

I could’ve spent forever with your hands in my pockets
Picture of your face in an invisible locket
You said there was nothing in the world that could stop it
I had a bad feeling (Dancing with our Hands Tied)

That realization made the blaster in his hand shake. His stomach had dropped. Snoke must’ve told her his plan to have Armitage kill her in the throne room. Both knew that Snoke was broadcasting this as far as he could. The Sith smirked at the shaky hand.

“Surely you’d enjoy getting revenge on the scum who fooled you,” he instigated, “She’s non-repentant as well. No care for you or for the Order; just her squabbling Resistance.”

Hux, knowing the consequences of not following through, forced himself to stop shaking. He dryly swallowed as he continued to stare at her. That little bit of a glimmer left was directed to him. But, he couldn’t trust it. He had to follow through, but it didn’t make it any easier.

“Y/N,” he whispered, “I love you.”

He closed his eyes.

Perma-tags: @beeeeeeeeeeeeeeeep @ttelesilla @jumperswellies @caitsymichelle13 @myplaceofthingsilove @frostbyte-horan @littlestfangirl @bestillmystuckyheart
Semi-tags: @the-viking-chronicles

50% smut 45% crack 5% angst
Christine. Late 20s. Actually wine mom. This blog is 100% for me posting my random shit. I solemnly swear to try to finish what I start, but make no other promises.

support my coffee addiction

summary: trust the force, trust in us ( 1/3 )
title: trust the force, trust in us ( 1/3 )
body:
Escape from Jedha ( and the shackles that hold me down )

es·cape verb

1. to get free of
2. to break away from
3. to avoid a threatening evil

Jyn Erso reimagined ( if she were still with the Partisans )
Word Count: 1987
Rating: Teen 

Jyn Erso Appreciation Week ♡ Day 3 Writing Prompt: Escape

They know who she is - this whole city does. She’s Saw Gerrera’s daughter, Jyn. They know that Saw… they know what he does, that it’s drastic, that he fights back against Imps throughout the galaxy, and yes, it makes Jedha a dangerous place to live…

They also know that Saw provides money, provides food, provides medicine. They know that when Jyn comes into the city, that she’s bringing something with her, and that the Guardians can be trusted to disperse it.

They know that when someone comes to Ni Jedha looking for Saw Gerrara, they should tell his daughter, Jyn, and then get out of the way. That’s exactly what happens, when an Imperial Cargo Pilot starts asking around for her father.

READ IT ON AO3

20y/o 🇦🇷 girl
A bit annoying.
Books and movie lover, on a secret relationship with comics(Reylo blog, mostly).
In this house we respect every fandom, every ship, and every person.
My DM's are always open if you need to talk!!

summary: If Rey doesn't get a double sided ligthsaber, i'll have a mental breakdown.
